name: Proto Tower 16
description: This is the first 32x32 pixel proto tower. Takes less time to draw, but obviously there's fewer opetions to correct flaws, so I'm finding these a bit more difficult to pull off effectively. Should be an interesting format to explore for the next 5. This next set of 5 will all be in this format, and all drawn with mouse + microsoft paint.

attributes.value: for i in {16..20}; do cp 15.json "$i.json"; done
